item.title: Delhi: Following incessant heavy rainfall in the National Ca
item.description: Delhi: Following incessant heavy rainfall in the National Capital, waterlogging and traffic jams are being seen in many places. Visuals from Shankar Vihar near Dhaula Kuan. VC - ANI #Delhi #Rain #News
